price: Ariko uwuzokwisubirako muri bo akigaya, agaheza akemera agakora n’ibikorwa vyiza bitegetswe, uyo azoba ari mu bantu Imana Allah Yemereye ukwigaya kwabo, bazokwinjira mu Bwami bw’ijuru, ntibazonarenganywa na gato ku ndishi y’ivyo bakoze;
arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا

meta.transliteration: illā man tāba waāmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan fa-ulāika yadkhulūna al-janata walā yuẓ'lamūna shayan
